channel.title: Whonix 16.0.3.7 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Whonix for VirtualBox
Download Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox
----
This is a point release.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release
----
# Major Changes
* Tor `0.4.6.8` * Tor Browser `11.0.1` * sdwdate can now fix time even if Whonix-Gateway is starting with very slow clock using anondate * Whonix-Workstation firewall: added opt-in configuration for outgoing IP filtering through `outgoing_allow_ip_list`
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute
----
# Changelog
[Whonix ™ 16.0.3.7](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stable_Release#Whonix_.E2.84.A2_16.0.3.7)
----
# Full difference of all changes
https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/16.0.3.1-developers-only...16.0.3.7-developers-only

item.title: Whonix 16.0.3.7 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix for VirtualBox

Download Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix – 28 Apr 21

Whonix ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Stable Version

This is a point release.

Whonix – 24 Apr 21

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

Major Changes

  • Tor 0.4.6.8
  • Tor Browser 11.0.1
  • sdwdate can now fix time even if Whonix-Gateway is starting with very slow clock using anondate
  • Whonix-Workstation firewall: added opt-in configuration for outgoing IP filtering through outgoing_allow_ip_list

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix – 9 Dec 20

Donating to Whonix ™

PayPal, Bitcoin, Monero, Bank Wire

Please Contribute!

Whonix – 23 Nov 21

Ways to Contribute

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Changelog

Whonix ™ 16.0.3.7

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/16.0.3.1-developers-only...16.0.3.7-developers-only
